definitions.definition: Mode of action; way of performing or doing anything
Characteristic mode of acting or behaving; bearing
definitions.example: His natural manner makes him seem like the boss.

definitions.definition: One's customary method of acting; habit.
The style of writing or thought of an author; the characteristic peculiarity of an artist.

definitions.example: It is in a manner done already.

definitions.definition: Standards of conduct cultured and product of mind.

definitions.example: Political correctness is tyranny with manners. ― Charlton Heston
